name: dk double crochet hat
notes:
**grab the free pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry.**

i have received many requests to create a pattern like my simple double crochet hat but for dk weight yarn or light weight yarn [3].

**this is the dk double crochet hat pattern.**

all sizes are available for free on my blog.

i have included 2 different lengths, mid-ear length and base-of-earlobe length.

i hope this pattern helps all of you who like to use light weight yarn!

> this pattern is available for free on
> my website which is monetized by ads.
> if you prefer an ad-free version of
> the pattern it is available to
> purchase from my pattern shop.

♥ rhondda
